name: mythos-sheet
description: inofficial Character-Tool for Cthulu Mythos World

scripts.build: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile
scripts.out:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder build --win --publish never
scripts.out:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --publish never
scripts.publish:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder build --win --publish always
scripts.publish:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder build --mac --publish always
scripts.publish:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder build --linux --publish always
scripts.publish: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron-builder build --win --publish always && electron-builder build --mac --publish always && electron-builder build --linux --publish always
